answerText: John Irving[10] In this Irving novel, Homer grows up at the orphanage of Dr. Wilbur Larch, who also secretly performs abortions. Homer's son Angel is the first child to go home from the orphanage with his birth mother.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 12 | 16 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This author wrote about a solution to Bogus Trumper's urological problems in The Water-Method Man. For 10 points each: [10] Name this author whose works often include Vienna, wrestling, and the title creatures of a novel in which the motorcyclists Siggy and Graff plan to liberate a zoo, Setting Free the Bears.
